data.name: Lamberti Personal Care
data.description:
Lamberti is a global manufacturer of chemical specialties focused on customers’ needs. Thanks to its well-established Technological Platforms, Lamberti Personal Care is fully committed to target consumers’ requirements with high-quality, performant ingredients. Each product within our portfolio is innovation-driven and designed to open new perspectives, supporting our customers in the development of the formulations of tomorrow.

Our approach for Personal Care combines a very strong knowledge, built over decades, with a seamless search for new advanced solutions. Working alongside our customers, we help transforming experience into groundbreaking raw materials, providing a unique tailor made service. This made our brands EUCAROL®, ESAFLOR® and VISCOLAM® appreciated and recognized worldwide.

Discover our #respectfulbeauty approach, for sustainable-by-design solutions and ingredients. Commitment to responsible chemistry, respect for nature and people, together with an eco-design vision are key building blocks of all novel Lamberti Personal Care developments. We are also constantly engaged into technological improvements, to reduce the environmental impact of production processes and to provide new sustainable solutions, maintaining a strong focus on performance, quality and regulatory requirements.

data.name: ESAFLOR
data.description: A range of natural polymer based versatile thickeners for hydro-alcoholic, glycols and glycerine solutions, specifically designed for cosmetics and personal care applications.

data.name: BEAUTYSPHAERA
data.description: BEAUTYSPHAERA® is a unique urethane powder suitable for leave-on applications such as skin care, sun care and make-up.

data.name: VISCOLAM® AT 100 P
data.description: VISCOLAM® AT 100 P is a ready-to-use rheology modifier for O/W emulsions. It is not only a thickening agent, but also an excellent stabilizer and texturizing agent. It is a pre-neutralized, liquid polymer in inverse emulsion, easy to process and to handle. It is extremely versatile, with a broad pH compatibility, being suitable both for hair or skin care applications. It can be used to develop formulas of any consistency, from thin lotions to rich creams and butters. It guarantees a fresh and melting skin feel.Physical form: liquid

data.name: ESAFLOR® PFT
data.description:
ESAFLOR® PFT is a cationic bio-based derivative of guar gum, specifically developed for clear formulations. It is characterized by moderate aqueous viscosity and optimal compatibility with surfactant systems. It offers light conditioning properties, ideal for volumizing and conditioning shampoos. At the same time it improves hair brightness. In skin cleansing formulations, such as shower gels, body washes and liquid soaps, it can increase mildness towards skin. Manufactured sustainable Esaflor® ZERO-X Tecnology.

Physical form: powder, 100%

data.name: VISCOLAM® GD19
data.description:
VISCOLAM® GD19 is a liquid, acrylic rheology modifier for surfactant based systems. It is designed to suspend, stabilize and thicken surfactant based personal care products. It is a easy-to-use product that provides exceptional clarity around neutral pH.

Physical form: liquid, 30% dispersion

data.name: EUCAROL® AGL 35 MB
data.description: Eucarol® AGL 35 MB is a glutamate-based, mild, anionic surfactant. It has outstanding foam-boosting properties, providing a fine and creamy foam in combination with other surfactants. It leaves a soft feeling on the skin during and after use. Due to its conditioning properties on skin and hair, it is also suitable for haircare, providing lubricity, softness, and a silky feel to the hair. Physical form: liquid, 30% solution

data.name: EUCAROL® B/M
data.description:
EUCAROL® B/M is a citric acid-derived, mild, anionic surfactant. Low irritating power and good foaming properties. Suitable for waterless or non-aqueous products.

Physical form: liquid, 100%

data.name: BEAUTYSPHAERA® S
data.description:
BEAUTYSPHAERA® S is a unique urethane powder suitable for leave-on applications such as skin care, sun care and make-up.

Physical form: powder

data.name: ESAFLOR® EC 3
data.description:
ESAFLOR® EC 3 is a cationic bio-based derivative of guar gum, with high molecular weight and medium cationic substitution. It offers optimal conditioning properties for hair and skin care products, as well as deposition of water-insoluble actives. Ideal for everyday-use shampoos. Suitable for conditioning shampoos, cream rinses, bath and shower products and other personal care products.

Physical form: powder, 100%

data.name: ESAFLOR® 4W
data.description:
ESAFLOR® 4W is a non-ionic, high molecular weight bio-based polymer, derived from guar gum. Excellent thickening properties, effective at low concentrations, especially in surfactant solutions. Good compatibility with electrolytes. Smooth skin feel.
Physical form: powder, 100%

data.name: ESAFLOR® EC 4
data.description:
ESAFLOR® EC 4 is a cationic bio-based derivative of guar gum, with high molecular weight and medium cationic substitution. It is self-hydrating, requiring no pH adjustment for its dissolution in water. It offers optimal conditioning properties for hair and skin care products, as well as deposition of water-insoluble actives. Ideal for everyday-use shampoos. Suitable for conditioning shampoos, cream rinses, bath and shower products and other personal care products.

Physical form: powder, 100%

data.seo_description: Lamberti is a global manufacturer of chemical specialties focused on customers’ needs. Thanks to its well-established Technological Platforms, Lamberti Personal Care is fully committed to target consu

featured_products.name: ESAFLOR® PFT
featured_products.description: Cationic, bio-based guar derivative, designed for crystal-clear formulations. Ensuring light conditioning and improving hair brightness, it is ideal for volumizing shampoos.

featured_products.name: EUCAROL® AGL C100 MB
featured_products.description: Powdered glutamate-based surfactant, with outstanding foam boosting properties, for a fine and creamy foam. Soft feeling to the skin and conditiond benefits for hair.

featured_products.name: ALPICARE D 3
featured_products.description: Highly effective dispersant of natural origin, for inorganic pigments, powders and sun filters. Ideal for color cosmetics, suncreens, skincare emulsions containing powders.

featured_products.name: ESAFLOR® LIGHT
featured_products.description: Eco-conscious, cationic guar derivative. Ensuring delicate conditioning to hair and skin, it is ideal for volumizing and conditioning shampoos, body washes or kids shampoos.

featured_products.name: ESAFLOR® PLUS
featured_products.description: Highly charged, cationic bio-based polymer. Ideal for thick, ethnic or damaged hair, it ensures excellent conditioning properties.

featured_products.name: EUCAROL® EASY MB
featured_products.description: NEW PRODUCT! Eucarol® EASY MB is an optimised blend of amino acid and glucoside derivatives in powder form,  with outstanding foam and mildness, coupled with easy rinse.

featured_products.name: ESAFLOR® PURE
featured_products.description: Cationic, bio-based guar derivative, ideal for ultra-clear formulations. It delivers superior conditioning, for soft hair, easy to comb.

featured_products.name: STEROL DBA
featured_products.description: Lightweight, fast spreading emollient with superior solubilising properties of crystalline chemical UV filters. It delivers a smooth and silky texture.

data.name: Sunscreen with Tio2 And Zno - LAMCOS 226
EUCAROL® AGL C100 MB Powdered Mildness Brochure
BEAUTYSPHAERA® S Enhanced Beauty Experience Brochure

data.heading: Respectful Beauty. When nature, ethics and science come together.

data.name: VISCOLAM
data.seo_description: View all Lamberti Personal Care Viscolam products on Knowde.com. Quickly and easily request a quote, get samples, and download data sheets.

data.name: VISCOLAM® AT 100 P
data.description: VISCOLAM® AT 100 P is a ready-to-use rheology modifier for O/W emulsions. It is not only a thickening agent, but also an excellent stabilizer and texturizing agent. It is a pre-neutralized, liquid polymer in inverse emulsion, easy to process and to handle. It is extremely versatile, with a broad pH compatibility, being suitable both for hair or skin care applications. It can be used to develop formulas of any consistency, from thin lotions to rich creams and butters. It guarantees a fresh and melting skin feel.Physical form: liquid

data.name: VISCOLAM® GD19
data.description:
VISCOLAM® GD19 is a liquid, acrylic rheology modifier for surfactant based systems. It is designed to suspend, stabilize and thicken surfactant based personal care products. It is a easy-to-use product that provides exceptional clarity around neutral pH.

Physical form: liquid, 30% dispersion

data.name: VISCOLAM® B25
data.description:
VISCOLAM® B25 is an acrylic rheologyy modifiers, highly effective as a thickener for crystal clear formultions above pH 7.5, with smooth honey-like flow. Ideal for high pH toiletries formulations and for clear gels.

Physical form: liquid, 30% dispersion

EXPERTS.HEADING: Message Our Experts For a Fast Response

HOME_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Knowde is the first marketplace for chemicals, polymers and ingredients. Our leading-edge digital capabilities connect thousands of suppliers and customers every day.

UNILEVER.QUOTE_CONTENT: Knowde is especially helping us with newer, smaller but up-and-coming suppliers that are useful to have on our radar especially in the field of Sustainability.

CURIO.QUOTE_CONTENT: Purchasing ingredients should always be this easy!

DIAMOND.QUOTE_BY: Diamond Overseas Trading Co. | Technical Manager
DIAMOND.QUOTE_CONTENT: It's an amazing website to search for chemicals and more!

PERSONAL_CARE.TITLE: Healthy Beauty by DSM
PERSONAL_CARE.DESCRIPTION: DSM has taken an in-depth look at the growing enthusiasm for medical beauty to make the best skin care ingredients for non-invasive solutions.

BEAUTY.TITLE: Beauty by Lubrizol Life Science
BEAUTY.DESCRIPTION: LLS partners with customers to develop, manufacture and market a broad range of differentiated ingredients for skin care, hair care and skin cleansing.

PEAS.TITLE: Plant Proteins by Roquette
PEAS.DESCRIPTION: The products made with NUTRALYS® don't just nourish us today – they help us feed ourselves tomorrow too. Together, we are changing how the planet eats.

WHY_KNOWDE.HEADING: Interact with over 8,000 suppliers, browse their catalogs, access documents and download starter formulations.

SECTION_1.HEADING: Instant access to the most comprehensive product catalog
SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: Browse, search and filter the world's largest catalog of chemicals, ingredients and polymers.

SECTION_2.HEADING: Talk directly to suppliers' experts
SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Ask technical product questions, talk to a sales rep and inquire about pricing.

SECTION_3.HEADING: Order samples, request documents, and get quotes
SECTION_3.DESCRIPTION: Knowde concierge will handle all the details and ensure your requests are handled faster than ever.

WHY_CHEMISTRY.HEADING: Driving the world's most impactful industry forward.

SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: At Knowde, we believe in the power of chemistry. We believe that easy and efficient access to information and raw materials enables you to work smarter and faster so you can continue to make a rich global impact.

SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Your innovations have decreased the carbon footprint of the automotive industry, imagined a sustainable agricultural future, developed alternative, biodegradable packaging materials, and changed the landscape of connectivity forever – to name a few. This is only the beginning.
SECTION_2.HEADING: We can't wait to see what you create with Knowde.

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_I: Knowde is a B2B platform where customers and suppliers conduct business online. Using a business email address demonstrates the legitimacy of your company and commercial intent, and you are much more likely to receive responses to your requests.
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_II: You can still use a personal email but you may have additional company verification steps before getting access to all of {companyName}'s features.

SELLER_ARRANGED.TITLE: Seller-Arranged Shipping

KNOWDE_PAY.LONG_DESCRIPTION: Now you can quickly transact online and avoid the hassle of establishing a new line of credit. Knowde will issue invoices and collect payments on behalf of the Supplier.

FLAVOR_ANALYZER.HEADER: Need a flavor that’s not in our online PRIMETIME catalog?

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
